The erikmisc logo, using ASCII or Unicode characters

Source: R/erikmisc_logo.R
erikmisc_logo.Rd

Use crayon::strip_style() to get rid of the colors.

erikmisc_logo(sw_unicode = l10n_info()$`UTF-8`)

Arguments

sw_unicode

Whether to use Unicode symbols. Default is TRUE on UTF-8 platforms.

Examples

erikmisc_logo()
#> 
#>  ⬢        . _ _   ⬡          _    ⬢  ⬡   
#>    ___ _ __(_) | ___ __ ___ (_)___  ___  
#>   / _ \ '__| | |/ / '_ ` _ \| / __|/ __| 
#>  |  __/ |  | |   <| | | | | | \__ \ (__  
#>   \___|_|  |_|_|\_\_| |_| |_|_|___/\___| 
#>     . .       ⬢           ⬢   ⬢       .  
#>
